```{r echo = FALSE}
library(dplyr)

# read in data
data <- file.path("~","Box","LukeLab","SkilledReadingStudy","results","resting","sfn2019","resting_clusters_trimmed.txt")
data <- read.table(data)

# fixing column names
names(data) <- c("Volume (µL)","CM LR","CM PA","CM IS","minLR","maxLR","minPA","maxPA","minIS","maxIS","Mean Z-score", "SEM", "Max Z-score", "MNI X", "MNI Y", "MNI Z")

# expanding volume
data$Volume <- data$Volume*27

# trimming unwanted columns
keep <- c("Volume (µL)", "Mean Z-score", "SEM", "Max Z-score", "MNI X", "MNI Y", "MNI Z")
data1 <- data[keep]
data1$Location <- c("lITS","lIFG","rIPL","rIC","LrOFG","rIFG","MrOFG")
data1 <- data1[,c(8,1:7)]

# render the table
knitr::kable(data1)
```
